TopicTitle: Fittings to go from hardlines to softlines

Articles.Content: Hello to all forum members from Georgia my name is Bryan a new member of this forum and I just wanted to say hello to all of you.

Hello bryanharris, and welcome to the forums! (Even though I'm not from Georgia )

I must say, that is the most puzzling title for a welcome thread that I have ever seen. I'm sure you'll fit right in.

Happy landings!

Fittings to go from hardlines to softlines?

I suggest going to the subforum "Fuel Flow," maybe?*

Welcome aboard!

*doesn't exist. Yet.
Launch stabilizers to parachute suspension lines.
